name: Barbedlands - Genepil
description:
• A digital card game written from scratch that's gone through all the circles of prototype hell;
  • Elements of the visual novel help to dive even deeper into the story of Master Izot;
  • Mongolian and Tuvan vampires!;
  • Original Mongolian-like music tracks;
  • Unreal Engine 5.1!
  • Approved by Tengri.

Vampire Ballerina Team:
Nazar Markov - Jam Lead, SFX, UIX, Game Design, Tech Art
Evgeny Nesterovsky - Unreal Engine Developer
Dmitrii Burkov - 2D Artist
Irina Nordsol - Promo 2D Artist
Aliaksei Dziashko - 3D Artist
Anastasia Kasyanova - Narrative Designer/Localization
Ilia Tarkhanov - Narrative Designer/Localization
Aila - Music Composer

Used Free Buyan Font
